name: Flipped Interaction
description: AI asks questions to better understand requirements

structure.instruction:
Before providing a solution, ask me questions to understand:
- Requirements
- Constraints
- Context
- Preferences
structure.process: Then provide a tailored solution based on my answers.

example:
Goal: Improve application performance

Before providing a solution, ask me questions to understand:
- Requirements
- Constraints
- Context
- Preferences

Then provide a tailored solution based on my answers.
